statements: DELETE FROM sas_user_access WHERE access_level = 'Admin' AND department_name = 'Finance';
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' AND user_id = 1;
DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 123 AND role_name = 'admin';
DELETE FROM role_permissions WHERE permission_name = 'write' AND role_name = 'editor';
DELETE FROM group_permissions WHERE group_id = 3 AND permission_id = 2;
DELETE FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 2 AND session_id = 5;
DELETE FROM role_permissions WHERE role_id = 100 AND permission_id IN (SELECT permission_id FROM permissions WHERE permission_name = 'delete_user');
